basics.name: Kyle Ross
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with six years of experience developing and maintaining responsive websites. Specializing in a variety of technologies such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, and AngularJS. Providing strong attention to detail to produce notable software quality and customer satisfaction. Proven team player with excellent communication skills. Self-driven and passionate about programming and technology. Eager to be challenged and pushed to grow career and life.
basics.headline: To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift

projects.name: happy-brews
projects.summary: Happy Brews is a sample coffee shop marketing website. Site built with HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

projects.name: snail-game
projects.summary: Snail game based on the old Tamagotchi games. Take care of your snail by feeding it and cleaning up its poop. Failure to do so will result in a quick death for your pet.

projects.name: new-age-photography
projects.summary: A photography portfolio website developed using Gatsby.

projects.name: natural supports
projects.summary: Site developed for The Social Impact Lab. Helps individuals explore and learn ways to assist youth with mental health concerns in their life.

projects.name: ikon pass
projects.summary: Site developed for Alterra Mountain Co. Showcases Ikon Pass a ski & snowboard pass that gives you access to mountains around the world.

projects.name: reactivities
projects.summary: Sign up and view community activities. Also, create activities for others to enjoy!

work.name: Nuera Insurance
highlights: Developed and maintained web-based insurance software using technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, MSSQL, and .NET Core.
Created unit and integration tests in order to ensure software high software quality and maintenance.
Contributed to an agile team to develop and test insurance applications built-on the Microsoft stack.
Fixed bugs from existing insurance systems significantly improving web functionality and usability.
Participated in daily stand up meetings, lead by a Scrum Master.

work.name: Evans Hunt
highlights: Building stable and robust marketing websites with HTML, CSS3, JavaScript, and React.
Ensured the development of professional websites supported by design and quality assurance teams.
Facilitated the structure and data of websites with content management systems Contentful and Silverstripe (PHP).
Worked with designers and other web developers to deliver large scale websites within a tight timeline.
Optimized websites to strongly enhance user experience and performance.
Improved quality assurance by providing maintenance on marketing websites.
Responsible for full-lifecycle application development and maintenance.

work.name: ICOM Productions Inc
highlights: Created an advanced application where content creators can self build their own e-learning course.
Developed web applications using front-end technologies  HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, and AngularJS.
Worked closely with a team of web developers through the software development lifecycle.
Collaborated with designers to ensure the development of simple and mobile responsive applications.
Manipulated Learning Management System with backend-technology PHP to produce API‚Äôs for login pages and e-learning web applications.
Met with clients to gather requirements and quote development schedules.
Developed reporting applications querying client data from MySql database management system.
Corrected and identified software deficiencies with support staff.
Provided guidance to other team members on web development.

work.name: The Hamptons Golf Club
highlights: Developed interactive and dynamic websites with front-end programming languages: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and jQuery.
Applied Search Engine Optimization (SEO) on websites to ensure increased traffic, page views, and page ranking.
Collaborated with a creative team to design, structure, and implement user-friendly websites.
Created and maintained WordPress sites serving as an interface for content management.

education.description: Provided a strong foundation in advanced algorithms, mathematics, database management, data analysis, programming, and software design. This while deepening knowledge in pertinent topics such as privacy, security, hacking, and ethics.

certificates.name: Azure Fundamentals
certificates.summary: Azure Fundamentals certification is an opportunity to prove knowledge of cloud concepts, Azure services, Azure workloads, security and privacy in Azure, as well as Azure pricing and support. Candidates should be familiar with the general technology concepts, including concepts of networking, storage, compute, application support, and application development.

meta.note: This is a combined version of the old and new JSON Resume API to provide maximum compatibility. You will notice duplicated values in different fields.
